mapper.insert: INSERT INTO market (seq, name, tel, address, location, time, etime, park, etc) VALUES((select nvl(max(seq), 0)+1 from market), #{name}, #{tel}, #{address}, #{location}, #{time}, #{etime}, #{park}, #{etc})
mapper.select: SELECT seq, name, tel, address, location, time, etime, park, etc FROM market ORDER BY seq desc
